DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Hyperbaric oxygen therapy may effective repair damage tissue reduce lymphedema cause radiation therapy cancer . PURPOSE : This randomized phase II trial study hyperbaric oxygen see well work compare standard therapy treat chronic arm lymphedema patient undergone radiation therapy cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy Compared With Standard Therapy Treating Chronic Arm Lymphedema Patients Who Have Undergone Radiation Therapy Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Compare efficacy hyperbaric oxygen ( HBO ) therapy v standard management , term reduction lymphedema , patient chronic arm lymphedema radiotherapy cancer . Secondary - Determine mechanism tissue reperfusion heal patient treat HBO therapy . OUTLINE : This randomize study . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients undergo hyperbaric oxygen therapy 90 minute 5 day week 6 week . - Arm II : Patients receive standard management . Patients follow 3 , 6 , 9 , 12 , 15 month . Peer Reviewed Funded Endorsed Cancer Research UK PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 63 patient ( 42 arm I 21 arm II ) accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : History early breast cancer ( T13 , N01 , M0 ) Prior breast surgery without axillary dissection Prior breast/chest wall radiotherapy without radiotherapy supraclavicular fossa and/or axilla , complete least 2 year ago Arm lymphedema At least 15 % increase arm volume No evidence cancer recurrence Hormone receptor status : Not specify PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age Over 18 Sex Female male Menopausal status Not specify Performance status Not specify Life expectancy Not specify Hematopoietic Not specify Hepatic Not specify Renal Not specify Pulmonary No chronic obstructive airway disease No bullous lung disease No acute chronic pulmonary infection No uncontrolled asthma No untreated pneumothorax Other Physically psychologically fit HBO therapy No claustrophobia No epilepsy No eustachian tube dysfunction No recurrent attack vertigo No contraindication MRI ( e.g. , intracranial ferrous material ) PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy Not specify Chemotherapy Not specify Endocrine therapy Not specify Radiotherapy See Disease Characteristics Surgery See Disease Characteristics No prior ear operation Other No prior hyperbaric oxygen ( HBO ) therapy , except treatment decompression illness
